metadata.name: Spring Violet #1
metadata.description:
In the combination of burnt matches and flowers, the match looks like a flower's leg in boots and at the same time becomes a symbol of the time, effort, and passion that had to be burned to make the flower bloom. In reality, a burnt match is useless, but in the painting, it rises and blooms again. It's about imagining things that are impossible in reality. 

#NFTart  #violet   #spring  #pansy  #physical-based  #animated
